mapper.insert: insert into DSE_PIPE_BASEINFO (ID, PIPE_NAME, CODE, PIPELINE_CODE, PIPELINE_NAME, PIPE_MATERIAL, PIPE_LENGTH, PIPE_RADIUS, PIPE_THICKNESS, INTERFACE_TYPE, START_POINT, END_POINT, COMPANY_ID, INSTALL_TIME, STATUS, TEMPERRATURE, TRANS_MEDIUM, PRESSURE, FLOW_THRESHOLD, PRES_THRESHOLD, DESIGN_DEPT, CONSTRUCTION_DEPT, SUPERVISOR_DEPT, BUILD_DEPT, LOCATION, USE_YEAR, TYPE, LOCATION_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipelineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipelineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipeMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pipeRadius,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipeThickness,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{temperrature,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transMedium,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pressure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flowThreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presThreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{designDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supervisorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DSE_PIPE_BASEINFO set PIPE_NAME = #{pipeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIPELINE_CODE = #{pipelineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIPELINE_NAME = #{pipelineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIPE_MATERIAL = #{pipeMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIPE_LENGTH = #{pipeLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PIPE_RADIUS = #{pipeRadius,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIPE_THICKNESS = #{pipeThickness,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTERFACE_TYPE = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_POINT = #{startPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_POINT = #{endPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTALL_TIME = #{installTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, TEMPERRATURE = #{temperrature,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRANS_MEDIUM = #{transMedium,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRESSURE = #{pressure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLOW_THRESHOLD = #{flowThreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRES_THRESHOLD = #{presThreshold,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESIGN_DEPT = #{designDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSTRUCTION_DEPT = #{constructionDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPERVISOR_DEPT = #{supervisorDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_DEPT = #{buildDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_YEAR = #{useYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, PIPE_NAME, CODE, PIPELINE_CODE, PIPELINE_NAME, PIPE_MATERIAL, PIPE_LENGTH, PIPE_RADIUS, PIPE_THICKNESS, INTERFACE_TYPE, START_POINT, END_POINT, COMPANY_ID, INSTALL_TIME, STATUS, TEMPERRATURE, TRANS_MEDIUM, PRESSURE, FLOW_THRESHOLD, PRES_THRESHOLD, DESIGN_DEPT, CONSTRUCTION_DEPT, SUPERVISOR_DEPT, BUILD_DEPT, LOCATION, USE_YEAR, TYPE, LOCATION_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from DSE_PIPE_BASEINFO where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
